patthana18.13:1.1: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana18.13:2.1: Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nana ca hetu nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
